entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden Apparated back to the Ministry and returned with reinforcements within fifteen minutes.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin and his father attempted to fight, but both were overpowered, removed from the cottage and subsequently convicted by the Wizengamot.

entities.name: marvolo
entities.description: Marvolo, who had injured several Ministry employees in addition to Ogden, received six months.

entities.name: merope
entities.description: Marvolo, his son Morfin and his daughter Merope were the last of the Gaunts,

entities.name: wizengamot
entities.description: both were overpowered, removed from the cottage and subsequently convicted by the Wizengamot.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Morfin, who already had a record of Muggle attacks, was sentenced to three years in Azkaban.

entities.name: gaunts
